snippet: New York City’s effort to promote diversity among the staffs, boards and audiences of its cultural organizations has been buttressed by $150,000 from foundations.
abstract: New York City's Cultural Affairs Dept is set to announce receiving $150,000 from foundations to support city's recently launched effort to promote diversity among staff, boards and audiences of its cultural organizations.
lead_paragraph: New York City’s effort to promote diversity among the staffs, boards and audiences of its cultural organizations has been buttressed by $150,000 from foundations.

headline.main: City’s Diversity Effort Gets Financial Backers
